features: 2-IN-1 COMBINATION: Do more in less space with this small toaster oven. Bake, broil, and toast by easily switching cooking modes with the slide of a lever. It doubles as a 2 slice toaster
TOAST 40% FASTER: The 2-in-1 toaster oven toasts breads 40% faster than the leading toaster oven, which means you can get your sliced bread warm and crispy, quick.
SPACIOUS INTERIOR: With 2 rack positions and a large interior that fits a 9” pizza, this toaster oven is perfect for making muffins, baked potatoes, casseroles, and more.
SEPARATE SHADE SELECTOR: 2-in 1 toaster oven gives you more control so you can reach the perfect level of golden brown toast.

60-MINUTE TIMER WITH AUTO SHUTOFF: Set toaster oven timer up to 60 minutes with peace of mind. The auto shutoff turns the oven off when baking time is reached. There’s no need to worry about overcooking or leaving the oven on.
body.description: Unclutter your counter with the Hamilton Beach 2-in-1 Oven and toaster This unique combo lets you cook personal-sized pizzas with a tender crispy crust and toast bread evenly in 40% less time than a traditional toaster oven.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research and rigorous testing to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach 2-in-1 Countertop Oven and Long Slot Toaster Toast, bake and broil in less space. Unclutter your counter with the Hamilton Beach 2-in-1 Oven and Toaster. This unique combo lets you cook personal-sized pizzas with a tender, crispy crust and toast bread evenly in 40% less time than a traditional toaster oven. With the simple slide of a lever, switching from the extra-wide slot toaster to the spacious oven is easy, making it perfect for the morning breakfast rush or busy weeknight dinner. Toasts 40% faster and more evenly than the leading competitor Extra-wide toast slot fits bagels and artisan breads Bake, broil & toast functions and separate toast shade selector Fits a 9” pizza 60-minute timer with auto shutoff

2-in-1 Combination Do more in less space. Bake, broil, and toast in one place by easily switching cooking modes with the slide of a lever. Toast 40% Faster This 2-in-1 toasts breads 40% faster than the leading toaster oven, which means you can get your sliced bread warm and crispy, quick. Spacious Interior With 2 rack positions and a large interior that fits a 9” pizza, this oven is perfect for making muffins, baked potatoes, casseroles, and more.

With more control, you can reach the perfect level of golden brown toast. 60-Minute Timer with Auto Shutoff Set the timer up to 60 minutes with peace of mind. The auto shutoff turns the oven off when baking time is reached. There’s no need to worry about overcooking or leaving the oven on. Optional Stay-On Setting Make multiple batches of chocolate chip cookies, or leave your sheet pan supper in until you think it’s perfectly roasted, with the stay-on setting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Interesting space saving design. Convenient and well made.
reviews.reviewText: Update: I changed the rating from 4 stars to 5. After about two months the main complaint of toast not being brown on the bottom has changed. I'm not sure why, but the toast is now evenly brown all over an dit browns quicker than before. ??? Maybe the elements needed to "burn in"? Whatever the problem was, it seems to be resolved now. Hooray!Our toaster bit the dust and we haven't had a toaster oven in years so we thought it was a clever idea to combine both and it is with one drawback (the bottom 1/2" -1" so of the toast doesn't brown due to the placement of the elements. It's not a dealbreaker for me because what it does brown is nice and even. The whole slice feels toasted, it's just not all brown. (see update above) You need to hold the toaster lever down for a couple seconds for it to catch and start toasting. You can't just push it down and release. I like that there is a cancel button and you can lift the toast slightly to help in removing it. It's handy that you can toast different shapes of bread in the wide slot. I like the overall size of this oven. It doesn't take up a lot of space in the kitchen. Not much more than the large 4 slice toaster we had. The controls are easy to use and not complicated like some. You do have to turn on the timer to get the oven to work. It has a pleasant timer alert, a must for my husband. Note, the alert only works with the oven, not the toaster. I like that the toaster part closes when not in use by pushing a lever. The oven heats up quickly. We've used the broiler a lot and it works great. I like that you can prop the door partly open to allow heat to dissipate after use. I bought a set of pans made for toaster ovens and am glad I did. It makes it much more versatile.My only real issue is that the whole thing gets quite hot. We didn't put it under a low overhanging cabinet for that reason. You don't want to touch the edges of door (the handle is fine) or outside parts of the oven when taking food out. I got several small burns when I used it the first couple times. I'm more aware now.Overall it's a great little toaster/oven and we're happy with our choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yeah, it is the best I have had.
reviews.reviewText: Toaster function is flawless, perfect on both sides, even color and through cooked. Ignore people saying it is hard to use. You have to hold the lever down for 1 second until red light comes on. Perfect toast on 2 and half setting. Waffles on 3. 5 is max.There is a reason for this in case you got you toast in there wonky or it slipped sideways and want to fix it real quick, just release. Slot is wide for bagels so some little skinny tiny piece of pumpkin toast might need adjusting. Think you are done and want to eject early? Hit red light button. Done.Corn dogs are notoriously difficult with my older toasters. I put two in the microwave for 50sec to defrost. Use rack on bottom setting. 8 min at 350. They come out perfect all the way around without constantly rotating them. Heated all way through. Kids love it.Fully eliminated two appliances for one and it looks nice too. The lack of digital controls is good. Knobs and buttons, less to break, simple for kids to use also.Ambient heat is no different than any other toaster I have had. The toast may sit low in the slot if your bread is small so yes use common sense when plucking it out. Even my kids understand that one.Highly recommend .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why did I not get one of these sooner!
reviews.reviewText: Though this doesn’t take up a lot of counter space, it has a nice amount of room inside. The bagel/oven features are very clever and work great; cooking anything perfectly. I love that I can cook things with it without having to heat up the kitchen with my big oven, great in the summer. It’s easy to clean and looks really nice on my counter. I highly recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars EASY TO OPERATE
reviews.reviewText: This is the best toaster oven I've ever had, and I've had a lot. Works great. Heats up food fast, makes great toast and is easy to clean. Does not use up a lot of counter space. I would have given a 5 star rating, but I'm disappointed it does not come in colors! Great choice, you wont be sorry 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the 2 in 1
reviews.reviewText: Love that it is a toaster and oven in one. The toaster option works great for waffles, for toasting bread and bagels. The oven works well, just remember to switch it from toaster to oven otherwise it will not work. I do wish it cooked the food quicker. We had another mini oven that cooked the food much faster but we liked the 2 in one option of this one. It is a little bigger than our previous countertop oven but doesn't affect us much. We have been using it for about 3 weeks and no complaints yet. Just keep in mind that the tray will make a popping sound and bend a bit after the first use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this toaster oven except the cooking sheet that comes with it is not the best quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Second one, love what Hamilton Beach has made
reviews.reviewText: This was a replacement for a previous 7 year old Toastation (still working great!), just didn't want to run a chance of not having one of these around even for a few days. Appreciate this one is a little bigger, allowing for more or slightly larger items. Nothing beats the toaster option, since it's used frequently, plus it toasts more evenly, since bread sits deeper into unit.I zap many items for very short time in microwave then finish off toasting in this little oven--speeding up preparation for a just out of the oven look and taste. Honestly, for our family this is a wonderful combination of traditional toaster and small baking oven.

this 2 in one toaster is great better than my breville toaster oven which broke after 2 years. very functional and easy to use what more can you ask oven and toaster great space saver i love this company hamilton beach
Que sean 2 en uno me gusto, mi cocina es chica y quedo perfecto tener tostador y horno juntos, calienta muy bien, hice una buena compra!

I love the look of it. The oven works well. The toaster not so well. We have it on the highest setting and it only toasts half of it and only on one side. It also takes a long time to toast the toast. It also gets very hot outside of it. It looks pretty that's about it. I pulled out my toaster as I got impatient waiting for my toast this morning. This was the main reason I purchased this item. I wanted to save counter space.
Producto muy práctico , es lo que buscaba: dos en uno

So far so good. Have been using the oven extensively for a week. Toaster function produces a nice uniform cook on both sides of toast. Oven feature worked well the couple times we've used it. I like the mixed design of the toaster / oven as I believe the toaster function cooks slightly quicker than just toasting in the oven, which makes sense given the heating elements are closer to the face of the bread.It's a bit more expensive than other ovens on the market but it was the only one I found with a split toaster and oven feature.
